column2: carries  on  business  in  that  Sate  through  a  broker,  general  commission
agent  or any other agent of  an  independent  status, where  such  persons

column1: are acting in the ordinary course of their business;

column2: 6.The  fact  that  a  company  which  is  a  resident  of  a  Contracting  State
controls  or  is  controlled  by  a  company  which  is  a  resident  of  the  other

column1: Contracting  State,  or  which  carries  on  business

column2: (whether  through  a  permanent  establishment  or  otherwise)  shall  not  of
itself constitute either company a permanent establishment of the other.
